products.facts: ["45.0 g is a measurement of mass commonly used in scientific and culinary contexts.","Materials weighing 45.0 g can vary widely, including metals, plastics, and organic substances.","In terms of ecology, 45.0 g of a material can have different environmental impacts depending on its composition and lifecycle.","Quality of a material weighing 45.0 g can be assessed based on its purity, durability, and suitability for specific applications."]

products.name: Garden Peas
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Legumes, Seeds, Legume seeds, Pulses, en:green-peas
products.facts: ["Garden peas are a rich source of vitamins A, C, and K, as well as dietary fiber and protein.","They are typically grown in cool climates and require well-drained, fertile soil for optimal growth.","Garden peas are often grown using sustainable practices, as they can fix nitrogen in the soil, reducing the need for synthetic fertilizers.","The quality of garden peas can be determined by their color, size, and sweetness, with vibrant green peas being the most desirable."]

products.facts: ["Sparkling natural mineral water is sourced from protected underground springs, ensuring purity and mineral content.","The water is naturally carbonated, meaning it retains its bubbles without the need for artificial carbonation.","Many brands use eco-friendly packaging, such as recyclable glass or PET bottles, to minimize environmental impact.","Quality is regulated by health standards, ensuring that the mineral content and safety meet strict guidelines for consumption."]
